text: Keiten'notami yo, anata gata ga motte iru mono (mūsā no rippō) o kakushō suru tame ni,(ima) ware ga kudashita mono (kuruān) o shinji nasai. Ware ga anata gata no kao o nuritsubushite, sore o ushiro no kata ni neji kai wa sa renai mae ni (shinji nasai). Mata katsute ansokujitsu o yabutta-sha-tachi ga, mikagira reta yō ni mi wa nasa renai mae ni (shinji nasai). Arrā no meirei wa, kanarazu nashitoge rareru nodearu
